contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zola Predosa | official_name = Comune di Zola Predosa | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Zola Predosa-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 44 |latm = 29 |lats = 18 |latNS = N | longd = 11 |longm = 13 |longs = 05 |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(16,446)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Emilia-Romagna]] | province = [[Province of Bologna|Bologna]] (BO) | frazioni = Gessi, Gesso, Lavino, Madonna dei Prati di Tomba, Ponte Ronca, Riale, Rivabella, Tombe | mayor_party = | mayor = Stefano Fiorini | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 37.8 | population_footnotes = <ref>Source: Commune of Zola Predosa </ref> | population_total = 17157 | population_as_of = 31 August 2007 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zolesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 74 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = St. Nicholas | day = December 6 | postal_code = 40069 | area_code = 051 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.zolapredosa.bo.it/}} | footnotes = }} '''Zola Predosa''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Bologna]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Emilia-Romagna]], located about 11 km west of [[Bologna]]. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.comune.zolapredosa.bo.it/ Official website] <br clear=all> {{Province of Bologna}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Emilia-Romagna]] {{EmiliaRomagna-geo-stub}}
